text: Called before i made my way down late at night to get a thermometer for my kid. 2 friendly staffs assisted me with a smile, 10 minutes before closing!
The ladies manning this Unity Store at IMM and the Kordel Product Advisor were very patient, knowledgeable, helpful and super friendly. Will definitely visit this store again

Special thanks to pharmacist Xavier for his expertise and outstanding customer service. He really gives his best for his customers and his knowledge of vitamins and products are truly great. Really appreciate it !
